publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3295 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiativeâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the summer youth football league initiative undertaken by police in the west and centre of Glasgow to provide an alternative to drugs and street crime for 14 to 18 year old boys; applauds the financial support of local businesses and the coaching schemes involving ex-Celtic player Paul McStay and ex-Ranger's junior coach David Preston, and supports such initiatives that promote healthy living through sport, fitness, team work and co-operation, develop interests and skills and encourage friendship between youths from neighbouring communities.
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Elaine Smith*, Donald Gorrie*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Helen Eadie*
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Karen Gillon*
S1M-3295 Glasgow Summer Youth Football League Initiative (lodged on 31 July 2002) Scott Barrie*
